title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 platform uses the Class.forName() method.
EB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 platform should not use the Class.forName() method.
SR: To fix this issue, change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4); This change should achieve the same functionality.
